channel.title: Hazbin Hotel on Den of devils
channel.description: Recent content in Hazbin Hotel on Den of devils

item.title: Bigger smile
item.description: Bigger smile Originally the original piece was going to feature Alastor upside down, but I decided against it. Made with Procreate. Alternate versions

item.title: Malware
item.description: Malware Angel Dust was inspired by PostPet, while Alastor was inspired by the infamous BonziBuddy. Made with Procreate.

item.title: April 1st
item.description: April 1st Something quick based on this official Hazbin Hotel art. Made with Krita, using Pixel Glade’s dithering brushes.
